Button4Down = 64

Button 4 down.

Button4Up = 128

Button 4 up.

Button5Down = 256

Button 5 down.

Button5Up = 512

Button 5 up.

LeftDown = 1

Left (button 1) down.

LeftUp = 2

Left (button 1) up.

MiddleDown = 16

Middle (button 3) down.

MiddleUp = 32

Middle (button 3) up.

MouseWheel = 1024

Mouse wheel moved.

None = 0

No button.
